chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Paul and Timotheus, the servants of Jesus Christ, to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:
items.plainText: Paul and Timotheus, the servants of Jesus Christ, to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:

items.text: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.
items.plainText: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.

items.text: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you,
items.plainText: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you,

items.text: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy,
items.plainText: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy,

items.text: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now;
items.plainText: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now;

items.text: Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:
items.plainText: Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:

items.text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all, because I have you in my heart; inasmuch as both in my bonds, and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are partakers of my grace.
items.plainText: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all, because I have you in my heart; inasmuch as both in my bonds, and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are partakers of my grace.

items.text: For God is my record, how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ.
items.plainText: For God is my record, how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ.

items.text: And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment;
items.plainText: And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment;

items.text: That ye may approve things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ;
items.plainText: That ye may approve things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ;

items.text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.
items.plainText: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.

items.text: But I would ye should understand, brethren, that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel;
items.plainText: But I would ye should understand, brethren, that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel;

items.text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace, and in all other places;
items.plainText: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace, and in all other places;

items.text: And many of the brethren in the Lord, waxing confident by my bonds, are much more bold to speak the word without fear.
items.plainText: And many of the brethren in the Lord, waxing confident by my bonds, are much more bold to speak the word without fear.

items.text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:
items.plainText: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:

items.text: The one preach Christ of contention, not sincerely, supposing to add affliction to my bonds:
items.plainText: The one preach Christ of contention, not sincerely, supposing to add affliction to my bonds:

items.text: But the other of love, knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel.
items.plainText: But the other of love, knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel.

items.text: What then? notwithstanding, every way, whether in pretence, or in truth, Christ is preached; and I therein do rejoice, yea, and will rejoice.
items.plainText: What then? notwithstanding, every way, whether in pretence, or in truth, Christ is preached; and I therein do rejoice, yea, and will rejoice.

items.text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer, and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,
items.plainText: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer, and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,

items.text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope, that in nothing I shall be ashamed, but that with all boldness, as always, so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whether it be by life, or by death.
items.plainText: According to my earnest expectation and my hope, that in nothing I shall be ashamed, but that with all boldness, as always, so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whether it be by life, or by death.

items.text: For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.
items.plainText: For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.

items.text: But if I live in the flesh, this is the fruit of my labour: yet what I shall choose I wot not.
items.plainText: But if I live in the flesh, this is the fruit of my labour: yet what I shall choose I wot not.

items.text: For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:
items.plainText: For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:

items.text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you.
items.plainText: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you.

items.text: And having this confidence, I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith;
items.plainText: And having this confidence, I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith;

items.text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again.
items.plainText: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again.

items.text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ: that whether I come and see you, or else be absent, I may hear of your affairs, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel;
items.plainText: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ: that whether I come and see you, or else be absent, I may hear of your affairs, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel;

items.text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries: which is to them an evident token of perdition, but to you of salvation, and that of God.
items.plainText: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries: which is to them an evident token of perdition, but to you of salvation, and that of God.

items.text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer for his sake;
items.plainText: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer for his sake;

items.text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me, and now hear to be in me.
items.plainText: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me, and now hear to be in me.
